title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. J, pt. 466 - General Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. J, pt. 466 - General Regulations

State Regulations
§ 466.1 - Posting of notices by employers, employment agencies, labor organizations and labor-management committees
§ 466.2 - Posting of notices at places of public accommodation, resort or amusement
§ 466.3 - Posting of notices concerning housing accommodations and commercial space
§ 466.4 - Posting of notices by volunteer fire departments and volunteer fire companies
§ 466.5 - Submission of plan to increase employment of members of minority group
§ 466.6 - Access to personal information
§ 466.7 - Public access to records
§ 466.8 - Discrimination on the basis of sex or marital status in extension of credit
§ 466.9 - Index of interested persons
§ 466.10 - Procedure for declaratory rulings
§ 466.11 - Provision of reasonable accommodation by employers, pursuant to human rights law, sections 292.21, 292.21-e, 295.5, 296.3 and 296.3-a
§ 466.12 - Payment of civil fines and penalties in installments by employers of fewer than 50 employees
§ 466.13 - Discrimination on the basis of gender identity or expression
§ 466.14 - Discrimination based on an individual's relationship or association with members of a protected class
§ 466.15 - Provision of notice by housing providers of tenants' rights to reasonable modifications and accommodations for persons with disabilities
§ 466.16 - Provision of notice regarding discrimination based on lawful source of income

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. J, pt. 466

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§292.21, 292.21 -e, 293, 295.5, 296.3, 296.3-a, 297.4[d]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
